title: Boost your Immune System with 5 of Nature’s Best Medicines – The Yucatan Times
content: Echinacea is known to boost production of the protein interferon ( which helps to kill viruses) and of infection-fighting white blood cells. It contains alkylamides, thought to prevent bacteria penetrating the skin.
warning: Based on the content, title and advertisements on this page, there is a risk that this page is not credible!
